00037     init(theName, theDesc, m12, m13, flavor, 0);

00040   virtual void init(const char * theName, const char * theDesc,
00041                     RooAbsReal &m12, RooAbsReal &m13, 
00042                     BdkDalitzBase::Flavor flavor,
00043                     RooRealVar* c[10]);
00044 
00045   // accessors:
00046   RooRealVar* c(int n) { return (n<=9 ? _c[n] : 0); }
00047   RooRealVar* s(int n) { return ((n>0)&&(n<=5) ? _c[n] : 0); }
00048   RooRealVar* a(int n) { return ((n>0)&&(n<=4) ? _c[n+5] : 0); }
00049 
00050   const RooRealVar* c(int n) const { return (n<=9 ? _c[n] : 0); }
00051   const RooRealVar* s(int n) const { return ((n>0)&&(n<=5) ? _c[n] : 0); }
00052   const RooRealVar* a(int n) const { return ((n>0)&&(n<=4) ? _c[n+5] : 0); }
00053
